items.content_html: A lightweight server clone of Azure Storage that simulates most of the commands supported by it with minimal dependencies
items.title: Azure/Azurite: A lightweight server clone of Azure Storage that simulates most of the commands supported by it with minimal dependencies

items.content_html: Lightweight package for creating flexible tables in React Native.
items.title: coligo-technologies/react-native-table: Lightweight package for creating flexible tables in React Native.

items.content_html: Nitrobase is a blazingly fast, lightweight database built on JSON. It stores data entirely in memory for lightning-quick access, while also providing a JSON file backup for persistence. You can easily serve your data over the web using our high-performance accelerated Nginx server.
items.title: Alwatr/nitrobase: Nitrobase is a blazingly fast, lightweight database built on JSON. It stores data entirely in memory for lightning-quick access, while also providing a JSON file backup for persistence. You can easily serve your data over the web using our high-performance accelerated Nginx server.

items.content_html: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.
items.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable starter kit for building TypeScript libraries. It comes with ESM support, flexible configuration options, extensive ESLint rules, and built-in Github Actions integration.
items.title: 2BAD/ts-lib-starter: A lightweight and customizable starter kit for building TypeScript libraries. It comes with ESM support, flexible configuration options, extensive ESLint rules, and built-in Github Actions integration.

items.content_html: A lightweight Chrome extension that provides a simple, customizable timer directly in your browser. Set, start, and manage multiple timers with ease, perfect for productivity, workouts, or reminders.

items.content_html: The "My Blog Platform" is a lightweight, interactive web application designed for users to create, publish, and view blog posts. The application features a user-friendly interface and utilizes a simple, dynamic layout to allow for seamless post creation and viewing.
items.title: Rishitha37/CODTECH-Task3: The "My Blog Platform" is a lightweight, interactive web application designed for users to create, publish, and view blog posts. The application features a user-friendly interface and utilizes a simple, dynamic layout to allow for seamless post creation and viewing.

items.content_html: A lightweight, web-based automation tool designed to simplify repetitive tasks for small teams and individuals. It focuses on ease of use, offering essential features like API integration, simple workflows, and execution monitoring without the complexity or high cost of other solutions.
items.title: TAGCH/Workflow-Automation: A lightweight, web-based automation tool designed to simplify repetitive tasks for small teams and individuals. It focuses on ease of use, offering essential features like API integration, simple workflows, and execution monitoring without the complexity or high cost of other solutions.

items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive blog platform designed for seamless content sharing and an enjoyable reading experience. Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.
items.title: YashRajput09/BlogBreez: A lightweight, responsive blog platform designed for seamless content sharing and an enjoyable reading experience. Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.
